operations.name: Create user's message
operations.description: Use this API to create a draft of a new message for another user. Drafts can be created in any folder and optionally updated before sending

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Create message
operations.description: Use this API to create a draft of a new message for Signed-in user. Drafts can be created in any folder and optionally updated before sending

operations.name: Update user's message
operations.description: Update the properties of message object for another user.

parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id
parameters.name: user Principal Name

operations.name: Update messages
operations.description: Update the properties of message object for signed-in user.

operations.name: Update user's mailfolder message
operations.description: Update the properties of message object in specific mailfolder for another user.

parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id
parameters.name: user Principal Name

operations.name: Update mailfolder message
operations.description: Update the properties of message object in specific mail folder for signed-in user.

operations.name: Delete user's message
operations.description: Delete message object for another user.

parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id
parameters.name: user Principal Name

parameters.name: user Principal Name

operations.name: Delete mailfolder message
operations.description: Delete message object in specific mail folder for signed-in user.

operations.name: Send user's message
operations.description: Send a message in the draft folder for another user. The draft message can be a new message draft, reply draft, reply-all draft, or a forward draft. The message is then saved in the Sent Items folder.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Send messages
operations.description: Send a message in the draft folder for signed-in user. The draft message can be a new message draft, reply draft, reply-all draft, or a forward draft. The message is then saved in the Sent Items folder.

operations.name: Copy a messages
operations.description: Copy a message to a folder for another user.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Copy messages
operations.description: Copy a message to a folder for signed-in user.

operations.name: Copy user's mailfolder messages
operations.description: Copy a specific mailfolder message to a folder for another user.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Copy mailfolder messages
operations.description: Copy a specific mailfolder message to a folder for signed-in user.

operations.name: Move user's messages
operations.description: Move a message to a folder for another user. This creates a new copy of the message in the destination folder.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Move messages
operations.description: Move a message to a folder for signed-in user. This creates a new copy of the message in the destination folder.

operations.name: Move user's mailfolder messages
operations.description: Move a specific mail folder message to a folder for another user. This creates a new copy of the message in the destination folder.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Move mailfolder messages
operations.description: Move a specific mail folder message to a folder for signed-in user. This creates a new copy of the message in the destination folder.

operations.name: Create user's reply to messages
operations.description: Create a draft of the reply to the specified message for another user. You can then update the draft to add reply content to the body or change other message properties, or, simply send the draft.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Create reply to messages
operations.description: Create a draft of the reply to the specified message for signed-in user. You can then update the draft to add reply content to the body or change other message properties, or, simply send the draft.

operations.name: Create user's reply to mailfolder messages
operations.description: Create a draft of the reply to the specific mail folder message for another user. You can then update the draft to add reply content to the body or change other message properties, or, simply send the draft.

parameters.name: User Principal Name
parameters.description: To specify the user's Email Id

operations.name: Create reply to mailfolder messages
operations.description: Create a draft of the reply to the specific mail folder message for signed-in user. You can then update the draft to add reply content to the body or change other message properties, or, simply send the draft.

operations.description: Reply to the sender of a message for another user. The message is then saved in the Sent Items folder.

operations.name: Create user's Override
operations.description: Create an override for a sender identified by an SMTP address for another user. Future messages from that SMTP address will be consistently classified as specified in the override.
